concept.title: Extended Tutorial
concept.shortdesc: The extended tutorial builds on the basic tutorial, using another set of stages to convert the data format from delimited to one that you can write to Elasticsearch.

conbody.p:
The extended tutorial continues with the following steps:
Use a Jython Evaluator to flatten data.
Convert fields to the appropriate data type.
Use the Expression Evaluator to merge field data.
Write the results to Elasticsearch.
